text: Stéphane Charbonnier (; 21 August 1967 – 7 January 2015), better known as Charb (), was a French cartoonist, journalist, and caricaturist. He was best known for his work on the satirical newspaper Charlie Hebdo. Charb was born in Conflans-Sainte-Honorine. Charb was among the victims who were killed in a shooting at Charlie Hebdo's Paris headquarters on 7 January 2015. He was 47.Charlie Hebdo : les dessinateurs Cabu, Charb et Wolinski sont morts Le Figaro. == Early life== Stéphane Charbonnier was born in Conflans-Sainte- Honorine on 21 August 1967 and raised in Pontoise. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1967 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French cartoonists Category:French journalists Category:Victims of the Charlie Hebdo shooting Category:People from Yvelines
title: Charb
